title: cmd/compile: compiler accepts unsafe.Sizeof([0]byte{}[0])
body:
cmd/compile accepts this program:

    package main
    import "unsafe"
    func main() {
    	_ = unsafe.Sizeof([0]byte{}[0])
    }

gotype rejects it with `foo.go:4:30: index 0 (constant of type int) is out of bounds`.
